charinfo.name: Tobi (S)
charinfo.description: Not much is known about Tobi (S) other than he appears to be a member of the Uchiha clan.

abilities.name: Tobi Sharingan
abilities.description: Tobi (S) uses Tobi Sharingan gaining 25% damage reduction permanently. This effect stacks. Kamui will deal an additional 20 damage for 1 turn when this skill is used. This skill can only be used 3 times.

abilities.name: Kamui
abilities.description: Using Kamui Tobi (S) deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. If that enemy uses a new skill the following turn Kamui will deal an additional 10 damage to that enemy for 1 turn. This skill ignores invulnerability.

abilities.name: Hidden Izanagi
abilities.description: Tobi (S) uses Hidden Izanagi. For 1 turn Tobi (S) will be invulnerable to enemy mental skills and Kamui will deal an additional 20 damage. Any enemy that uses a new skill on Tobi (S) will be dealt 5 piercing damage permanently*. This effect stacks.

abilities.name: Uchiha Perception
abilities.description: This skill makes Tobi (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
